speakers.name: Narendra Modi
speakers.desc: Prime Minister of India, leading major economic and social reforms.

speakers.name: Ratan Tata
speakers.desc: Indian industrialist and former chairman of Tata Sons, known for his philanthropy.

speakers.name: A. R. Rahman
speakers.desc: Indian composer, singer, and music producer, winner of two Academy Awards.

speakers.name: Sundar Pichai
speakers.desc: CEO of Alphabet Inc. and its subsidiary Google LLC, tech visionary.

speakers.name: Priyanka Chopra
speakers.desc: Indian actress, singer, and film producer, known for her work in Bollywood and Hollywood.

speakers.name: Virat Kohli
speakers.desc: Indian cricketer and former captain of the Indian national team.

speakers.name: Deepika Padukone
speakers.desc: Indian actress and producer, known for her roles in Bollywood films.
